titleStmt.title: Thomas E. Bramlette to John Boyle
CWG14255

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: Flat Storage Box: 11th Ky Cav (US) Muster Rolls, Bundle 6

body.p:
Commonwealth of Kentucky,
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT,
Frankfort, Sept 26th 1863.
Adjt Genl:
If the Office of Lt Col 11th Ky Cavalry is vacant, issue Comission to Archibald J Alexander, as Lt Col 11th Ky Cavalry.-

He helped raise the Regt and by some reason your predecessor, omitted to give him the position agreed upon between Col Rily & Alexander upon the consolidation of their men. Riley has resigned I understand & the vacancy - if not filled should be filled by Col Alexander

11 Cavy
Lt. Col.
Alexander
Com. issd & dele
Septr 26. 1863
Archibald J. Alexander com Lieut Col. 11" Cavy Reg Ky Vols. Septr 26. 1863 vice Wm. E Riley resig:-
